title: How to Do the Boom Snap Clap Hand Game

steps.title: Hit your upper chest with a fist or open palm.
steps.content: Hit your upper chest with a fist or open palm. Boom!

steps.title: Snap with your right hand.
steps.content: Snap with your right hand. Snap!

steps.title: Hit your upper chest two times.
steps.content: Hit your upper chest two times. Ba-boom!

steps.title: Hit your chest twice again.
steps.content: Hit your chest twice again. Ba-boom!

steps.title: Put your right finger to your mouth.
steps.content: Put your right finger to your mouth. Shh!

steps.title: Put it all together, doing the motions in-sync.
steps.content: Put it all together, doing the motions in-sync. "Boom, snap, clap. Ba-boom, snap, clap, snap. Boom, snap, clap. Ba-boom, snap, shh!" Then repeat. If you don't get it, try asking someone to teach you or just keep practicing!
